claims.claim: Databricks enables centralized data management eliminating redundancy and reducing costs
claims.quote: Currently, most teams employ a patchwork of software systems, leading to redundancy, data silos, sluggish processing times, and exorbitant costs. Databricks enables teams to centralize all their data, regardless of its structure, under one roof.

claims.claim: Real-time insights enable informed decision-making during practice and games
claims.quote: The ability to pull real-time insights is invaluable as it empowers coaches and players to make informed decisions during practice or games.

claims.claim: Databricks reduces data processing delays from hours/days to real-time
claims.quote: In many cases, MLB teams have waited for hours or even days to receive information that could have impacted a game or prevented injuries to key players. However, Databricks Structured Streaming alleviates this issue.

claims.claim: Databricks lakehouse platform powered analytics that informed roster construction decisions leading to World Series victory
claims.quote: Databricks' lakehouse platform powered Texas' use of analytics to inform general manager Chris Young and the decisions that led to the construction of the Rangers' roster.

claims.claim: Analytics fueled by Databricks informed strategic decisions throughout the championship season
claims.quote: And it fueled the analytics to inform the decisions made by the players, Bochy and the Rangers' coaching staff as the team played each opponent over the course of 162 regular season and 17 postseason games on their way to winning the franchise's first championship.

claims.claim: Previous data infrastructure could not accommodate required data volume by 2021
claims.quote: By 2021, the Rangers' existing data infrastructure was no longer able to accommodate all the data the team required to keep pace with the rest of the sport.

claims.claim: Texas Rangers achieved 375% ROI from Databricks deployment
claims.quote: The Texas Rangers achieved a 375 percent ROI by deploying the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform to drive efficient data storage and processing and better enable the organization's internal data teams.
